message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe the value it brings to your business will exceed the price. Let's discuss further!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This reflects a significant compromise on my end, and it's still a great deal for both of us.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000.
